parameters.name: cfg

param_schema.title: Cfg
param_schema.description: How strongly the video follows the prompt

parameters.description: How strongly the video follows the prompt

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

parameters.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: Optional input image to use as the starting frame

parameters.description: Optional input image to use as the starting frame

parameters.name: length

param_schema.description: Length of the output video in frames

parameters.description: Length of the output video in frames

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: best quality, 4k, HDR, a tracking shot of a beautiful scene

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.default: best quality, 4k, HDR, a tracking shot of a beautiful scene
param_schema.description: Text prompt for the video. This model needs long descriptive prompts, if the prompt is too short the quality won't be good.

parameters.description: Text prompt for the video. This model needs long descriptive prompts, if the prompt is too short the quality won't be good.

parameters.name: target_size

param_schema.description: Target size for the output video

parameters.description: Target size for the output video

parameters.name: aspect_ratio

param_schema.description: Aspect ratio of the output video. Ignored if an image is provided.

parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the output video. Ignored if an image is provided.

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.default: low quality, worst quality, deformed, distorted

param_schema.title: Negative Prompt
param_schema.default: low quality, worst quality, deformed, distorted
param_schema.description: Things you do not want to see in your video

parameters.description: Things you do not want to see in your video

parameters.name: image_noise_scale

param_schema.title: Image Noise Scale
param_schema.description: Lower numbers stick more closely to the input image

parameters.description: Lower numbers stick more closely to the input image
